website_summaries.verdict: Popular brand and manufacturer of diesel exhaust fluid with a product offered at a good price.
pros: Successfully creates safe nitrogen gas and water vapor from NOx in diesel exhaust
This product meets all EPA regulations regarding Selective Catalytic Reduction engines
Gives you a good value versus other DEF options
Ships with a fill tube so you can add the product to the DEF tank safely
cons: Jug may leak if fill tube is not attached properly, so you may want a funnel

customer_reviews.title: Only one container in package...
customer_reviews.text: I recommend not buying this product, it only has one container of the DEF fluid not two. Not a good deal unless you get both containers...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to expensive, shop locally
customer_reviews.text: It is what is advertised. Unfortunately I just found it at a local store for 1/2 this price. Save your money and shop around, currently being sold for about $10.00 for 2.5 gallons
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good deal. Haven't used this yet as I placed a previous order, I believe from another seller, that disappeared during shipping. Two weeks later I ordered this but my DEF was exhausted, less than 100 miles left with a 140 mile commute the next day. Bought 2.5 gallons locally the day before this arrived. Used the same brand as this and my diesel seems to like it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Willis

customer_reviews.title: Required "additive" for newer diesel pickup engines
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2016 Dodge "Eco-Diesel" 1/2 ton pickup that requires diesel exhaust fluid to be used. This brand is the only one I have commonly seen for sale - so I use it. It is easier to order it online and have it delivered to me door.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle dribbled
customer_reviews.text: Received two boxes, as described. Glad I purchased separate funnel. It dripped from where the nozzle attaches to the jug, which is unfortunate since it's corrosive to metal. Had to be careful and wipe down area after. Eventually took nozzle off, and used the funnel.
customer_reviews.author: ryanpc

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is in a good quantity to fill tank 1/4 full
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Helsel

customer_reviews.title: Works great for TDI
customer_reviews.text: Blue def works great in my Jetta TDI. I fill my car not directly because to reduce spills. I fill up a bottle with a special top.
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: missing order
customer_reviews.text: missing from order one jug 2.5 gallon. package was damaged upon receipt. please correct and comment.
customer_reviews.author: fortuneAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: We live in an era where we have to put urine in our trucks. Well not actually urine, but a form of it! Hey it helps the environment and helps keep our cat converters running cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: David Stokes

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works. No issues. Love being able to get it delivered when I don’t have time to hunt it down.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Only 2.5 gallons
customer_reviews.text: On several reviews it is asked if it is 5 gallons or 2.5 gallons. It is 2.5. Unless they ship two boxes!!!! I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader from Omaha

customer_reviews.title: Items as described. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Product received as described. Got one box and got the other the very next day. Dash shipping. Will order again. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Product is very good/quality.
customer_reviews.text: Seller was not good. Nothing to do with the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: mk1973

customer_reviews.title: Only got 1 bottle
customer_reviews.text: I got screwed, like others. Not a 2 pack.....only one 2.5 gallon bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After poreit into bmw check engine light come up. replaced it with original everyting goes back to normal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Leaks a little bit out of lid when pouring. Happened on two different bottles. Used two to fill up def tank in 2018 Ford F-250.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your diesel vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Always prefer filling up with this myself instead of paying a higher price at the dealer. Always get this brand and size.
customer_reviews.author: Danbo

customer_reviews.title: Work well on My F-150
customer_reviews.text: Just couple of bucks expensive than your local auto shop but you will get this heavy stuff at your front door.
customer_reviews.author: Chul Hyun Park

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Providing the adjustable spout as part of the package was a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: R. Billings

customer_reviews.title: Can spill if not very careful.....
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why asking about sheerness and warmth for this product? Great product but spills
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Adam Rome

customer_reviews.title: UPS succeeded in bursting the first shipment. They tried ...
customer_reviews.text: UPS succeeded in bursting the first shipment. They tried with the second one...but were not able to completely empty one of the containers. I think they used it for bean bag practice!!
customer_reviews.author: FHP6

customer_reviews.title: Best advice search around and look for the best
customer_reviews.text: What can you say, it does the job for those of us who have to use this. Have found it cheaper here locally (sale item) at our farm supply store. Best advice search around and look for the best deal
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Got to have it!
customer_reviews.text: Something that is a "must have" with the new emission friendly diesels.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Working for my Jeep diesel engine
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these for my 2014 grand Cherokee diesel engine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but hose leaks
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 2014 Audi Q7. It worked great but the hose leaked. Fortunately I had bought the Motorcraft nozzle and everything was great after that. You can do better on price but this is still a fraction of the cost of Audi fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: The shipping is all we or this would have been a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mongone

customer_reviews.title: Contaminated with Water...
customer_reviews.text: Contaminated. Within days of putting this DEF fluid in my vehicle, I got a bad fluid warning. Dealer is refusing coverage arguing I put in contaminated fluid that had water get into it based on their hydrometer test. They have to drain and refill it at my cost. As I filled the vehicle and had this occur during a drought here in GA where we went 42 days without rain, I can verify the water didn't get into the fluid after I received it. What a pain. Buy the fluid from Chrysler-Jeep and they charge an outrageous price for it. Buy it generic and they won't cover repairs related to it. Never buying a diesel that uses DEF fluid again.
customer_reviews.author: Lawraven22

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Really like included pour nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing this product is kind of like reviewing radiator coolant. If it does its job correctly, there really isn't much to say. I use it in a 2014 Grand Cherokee Overland Diesel. The DEF system takes this product without any issues. I can go about 10,000 miles on a full DEF tank of this product, which is about what I expected. The included nozzle does make pouring it into the tank a breeze...no need to use an extra funnel. Doesn't splash around or leak at all when pouring it into the tank. Definitely pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tycoop

customer_reviews.title: NOT A 2-PACK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product description is incorrect. It is not a two pack. Only one 2.5 gallon container received.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Souza

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and I love that I can order it on Amazon for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Don Atreides

product_meta.title: Blue Def DEF002-2PK Diesel Exhaust Fluid, 2.5 Gallon, 2 Pack
product_meta.description: Diesel exhaust fluid is one of the key elements of the Selective Catalytic Reduction (SCR) process used by most medium and heavy-duty engine builders to meet EPA 2010 regulations. Blue DEF is a non-toxic solution of 67.5 percent purified water and 32.5 percent ultra pure automotive grade urea. Blue DEF is not a fuel or fuel additive. Instead, when injected into the exhaust stream and passed over a catalyst, helps convert NOx into nitrogen gas and water vapour, two harmless and natural components of the air. is stable, colourless and odourless, and meets ISO Standards 22241 for purity and composition and is an American Petroleum Institute (API) certified diesel exhaust fluid. These are the highest quality and safety standards in place to ensure optimum SCR performance. Making sure you do not run out of in a SCR equipped truck is simple, watch the Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) gauge, which is part of the diesel fuel gauge, for when it is time to refill. DEF is stored in a dedicated tank next to the fuel tank on the driver's side. The tanks range in size from 6 to 23 gallons depending on the truck's application. The DEF tank fill opening is designed to accommodate a DEF fill nozzle to ensure only DEF is put into the tank. A diesel fuel nozzle will not fit into the DEF tank opening.
feature_bullets: One gallon of is used approximately every 300 miles
A truck with a 20 gallon DEF tank can go up to 6000 miles between fill-ups
When used in an SCR system will reduce the levels of NOx emissions of those engines
